mapper.select:
SELECT id, hosp_code hospCode, insure_reg_code insureRegCode, hosp_item_id hospItemId, hosp_item_code hospItemCode, hosp_item_name hospItemName, hosp_item_spec hospItemSpec, hosp_item_price hospItemPrice, hosp_item_unit_code hospItemUnitCode, is_match isMatch, audit_code auditCode, nation_code nationCode FROM insure_item_match WHERE hosp_code = #{hospCode} AND insure_reg_code = #{insureRegCode} AND is_match = #{isMatch} AND hosp_item_type = #{hospItemType}
and (hosp_item_name like '%${keyword}%' or hosp_item_code like '%${keyword}%' or pym like '%${keyword}%' or wbm like '%${keyword}%' or nation_code like '%${keyword}%')
mapper.insert:
insert into insure_item_match( id, hosp_code,insure_reg_code,item_code, pqcc_item_id, hosp_item_id, hosp_item_name, hosp_item_code, hosp_item_type, hosp_item_spec, hosp_item_unit_code, hosp_item_prep_code, hosp_item_price, standard_code, audit_code, is_match, is_trans, is_valid, pym, wbm, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time,nation_code) values
( #{item.insureId}, #{item.hospCode}, #{item.insureRegCode}, #{item.bigTypeCode}, #{item.insureCode}, #{item.id}, #{item.goodName}, #{item.code}, #{item.typeCode}, #{item.spec}, #{item.unitCode}, #{item.prepCode}, #{item.price}, #{item.insureCode}, '0', '0', '0', '0', #{item.goodPym}, #{item.goodWbm}, #{item.crteId}, #{item.crteName}, now(), #{item.nationCode} )

insert into insure_item_match( id, hosp_code, insure_reg_code, item_code, hosp_item_id, hosp_item_name, hosp_item_code, hosp_item_type, hosp_item_spec, hosp_item_unit_code, hosp_item_price, audit_code,is_match, is_trans, is_valid, pym, wbm, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time,nation_code) values
( #{item.insureId}, #{item.hospCode}, #{item.insureRegCode}, #{item.bigTypeCode}, #{item.id}, #{item.name}, #{item.code}, #{item.typeCode}, #{item.spec}, #{item.unitCode}, #{item.price}, '0', '0', '0', '0', #{item.namePym}, #{item.nameWbm}, #{item.crteId}, #{item.crteName}, now(), #{item.nationCode} )

insert into insure_item_match( id, hosp_code, insure_reg_code, item_code, hosp_item_id, hosp_item_name, hosp_item_code, hosp_item_type, hosp_item_spec, hosp_item_unit_code, hosp_item_price, audit_code,is_match, is_trans, is_valid, pym, wbm, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time,nation_code) values
( #{item.insureId}, #{item.hospCode}, #{item.insureRegCode}, #{item.bigTypeCode}, #{item.id}, #{item.name}, #{item.code}, #{item.typeCode}, #{item.spec}, #{item.unitCode}, #{item.price}, '0', '0', '0', '0', #{item.pym}, #{item.wbm}, #{item.crteId}, #{item.crteName}, now(), #{item.nationCode} )

insert into insure_item_match(id, hosp_code, insure_reg_code, item_code, molss_item_id, pqcc_item_id, hosp_item_id, hosp_item_name, hosp_item_code, hosp_item_type, hosp_item_spec, hosp_item_unit_code, hosp_item_prep_code, hosp_item_price, insure_item_name, insure_item_code, insure_item_type, insure_item_spec, insure_item_unit_code, insure_item_prep_code, insure_item_price, deductible, standard_code, check_price, manufacturer, audit_code, is_match, is_trans, is_valid, take_date, lose_date, pym, wbm, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time,tcmdrug_used_way) values (#{id}, #{hospCode}, #{insureRegCode}, #{itemCode}, #{molssItemId}, #{pqccItemId}, #{hospItemId}, #{hospItemName}, #{hospItemCode}, #{hospItemType}, #{hospItemSpec}, #{hospItemUnitCode}, #{hospItemPrepCode}, #{hospItemPrice}, #{insureItemName}, #{insureItemCode}, #{insureItemType}, #{insureItemSpec}, #{insureItemUnitCode}, #{insureItemPrepCode}, #{insureItemPrice}, #{deductible}, #{standardCode}, #{checkPrice}, #{manufacturer}, #{auditCode}, #{isMatch}, #{isTrans}, #{isValid}, #{takeDate}, #{loseDate}, #{pym}, #{wbm}, #{crteId}, #{crteName}, #{crteTime},#{tcmdrugUsedWay})

insert into insure_item_match (id, hosp_code, insure_reg_code, item_code, molss_item_id, pqcc_item_id, hosp_item_id, hosp_item_name, hosp_item_code, hosp_item_type, hosp_item_spec, hosp_item_unit_code, hosp_item_prep_code, hosp_item_price, insure_item_name, insure_item_code, insure_item_type, insure_item_spec, insure_item_unit_code, insure_item_prep_code, insure_item_price, deductible, standard_code, check_price, manufacturer, audit_code, is_match, is_trans, is_valid, take_date, lose_date, pym, wbm, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time,tcmdrug_used_way,nation_code) values
(#{item.id},#{item.hospCode}, #{item.insureRegCode}, #{item.itemCode}, #{item.molssItemId}, #{item.pqccItemId}, #{item.hospItemId}, #{item.hospItemName}, #{item.hospItemCode}, #{item.hospItemType}, #{item.hospItemSpec}, #{item.hospItemUnitCode}, #{item.hospItemPrepCode}, #{item.hospItemPrice}, #{item.insureItemName}, #{item.insureItemCode}, #{item.insureItemType}, #{item.insureItemSpec}, #{item.insureItemUnitCode}, #{item.insureItemPrepCode}, #{item.insureItemPrice}, #{item.deductible}, #{item.standardCode}, #{item.checkPrice}, #{item.manufacturer}, #{item.auditCode}, #{item.isMatch}, #{item.isTrans}, #{item.isValid}, #{item.takeDate}, #{item.loseDate}, #{item.pym}, #{item.wbm}, #{item.crteId}, #{item.crteName}, #{item.crteTime},#{item.tcmdrugUsedWay},#{item.nationCode} )

update.foreach:
update insure_item_match
item_code = #{item.bigTypeCode},
pqcc_item_id = #{item.nationCode},
hosp_item_id = #{item.id},
hosp_item_name = #{item.goodName},
hosp_item_code = #{item.code},
hosp_item_type = #{item.typeCode},
hosp_item_spec = #{item.spec},
hosp_item_unit_code = #{item.unitCode},
hosp_item_prep_code = #{item.prepCode},
hosp_item_price = #{item.price},
standard_code = #{item.insureCode},
pym = #{item.goodPym},
wbm = #{item.goodWbm},
wbm = #{item.tcmdrugUsedWay},
where hosp_item_id = #{item.id} and hosp_code= #{item.hospCode}

update insure_item_match
hosp_item_name = #{item.name},
hosp_item_code = #{item.code},
hosp_item_type = #{item.typeCode},
hosp_item_spec = #{item.spec},
hosp_item_unit_code = #{item.unitCode},
hosp_item_price = #{item.price},
pym = #{item.namePym},
wbm = #{item.nameWbm},
wbm = #{item.tcmdrugUsedWay},
where hosp_item_id = #{item.id} and hosp_code= #{item.hospCode}

update insure_item_match
hosp_item_name = #{item.name},
hosp_item_code = #{item.code},
hosp_item_type = #{item.typeCode},
hosp_item_spec = #{item.spec},
hosp_item_unit_code = #{item.unitCode},
hosp_item_price = #{item.price},
pym = #{item.pym},
wbm = #{item.wbm},
wbm = #{item.tcmdrugUsedWay},
where hosp_item_id = #{item.id} and hosp_code= #{item.hospCode}

update insure_item_match
item_code = #{item.itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
molss_item_id = #{item.molssItemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pqcc_item_id = #{item.pqccItemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hosp_item_id = #{item.hospItemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hosp_item_name = #{item.hospItemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hosp_item_code = #{item.hospItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hosp_item_type = #{item.hospItemType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hosp_item_spec = #{item.hospItemSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hosp_item_unit_code = #{item.hospItemUnitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hosp_item_prep_code = #{item.hospItemPrepCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hosp_item_price = #{item.hospItemPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
insure_item_name = #{item.insureItemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
insure_item_code = #{item.insureItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
insure_item_type = #{item.insureItemType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
insure_item_spec = #{item.insureItemSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
insure_item_unit_code = #{item.insureItemUnitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
insure_item_prep_code = #{item.insureItemPrepCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
insure_item_price = #{item.insureItemPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
deductible = #{item.deductible,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
standard_code = #{item.standardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
check_price = #{item.checkPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
manufacturer = #{item.manufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_code = #{item.auditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_match = #{item.isMatch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_trans = #{item.isTrans,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_valid = #{item.isValid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
take_date = #{item.takeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
lose_date = #{item.loseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
where hosp_code = #{item.hospCode}
and id = #{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR }
and insure_reg_code= #{item.insureRegCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR }
and hosp_item_code= #{item.hospItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR }
wbm = #{item.tcmdrugUsedWay},

mapper.update:
update insure_item_match
insure_reg_code = #{insureRegCode},
item_code = #{itemCode},
molss_item_id = #{molssItemId},
pqcc_item_id = #{pqccItemId},
hosp_item_id = #{hospItemId},
hosp_item_name = #{hospItemName},
hosp_item_code = #{hospItemCode},
hosp_item_type = #{hospItemType},
hosp_item_spec = #{hospItemSpec},
hosp_item_unit_code = #{hospItemUnitCode},
hosp_item_prep_code = #{hospItemPrepCode},
hosp_item_price = #{hospItemPrice},
insure_item_name = #{insureItemName},
insure_item_code = #{insureItemCode},
insure_item_type = #{insureItemType},
insure_item_spec = #{insureItemSpec},
insure_item_unit_code = #{insureItemUnitCode},
insure_item_prep_code = #{insureItemPrepCode},
insure_item_price = #{insureItemPrice},
deductible = #{deductible},
standard_code = #{standardCode},
check_price = #{checkPrice},
manufacturer = #{manufacturer},
audit_code = #{auditCode},
is_match = #{isMatch},
is_trans = #{isTrans},
is_valid = #{isValid},
take_date = #{takeDate},
lose_date = #{loseDate},
pym = #{pym},
wbm = #{wbm},
crte_id = #{crteId},
crte_name = #{crteName},
crte_time = #{crteTime},
lmt_user_flag = #{lmtUserFlag},
lim_user_explain = #{limUserExplain},
tcmdrug_used_way = #{tcmdrugUsedWay},
nation_code = #{nationCode},
remark = #{remark},
hilist_lv = #{hilistLv},
chrg_type = #{chrgType},
hilist_price = #{hilistPrice}
where id = #{id} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}
mapper.delete: delete from insure_item_match where hosp_code =#{hospCode} and id =#{id}

delete from insure_item_match where insure_item_code in
#{item.insureItemCode}
delete from insure_item_match where hosp_code =#{hospCode} and insure_reg_code =#{insureRegCode} and id =#{id}
mapper.select:
select id, hosp_code, insure_reg_code, item_code, pqcc_item_id, hosp_item_id, hosp_item_name, hosp_item_code, hosp_item_type, hosp_item_spec, hosp_item_unit_code, hosp_item_prep_code, hosp_item_price, insure_item_name, insure_item_code, insure_item_type, insure_item_spec, insure_item_unit_code, insure_item_prep_code, insure_item_price, deductible, standard_code, check_price, manufacturer, audit_code, is_match, is_trans, is_valid, take_date, lose_date, pym, wbm, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time,tcmdrug_used_way from insure_item_match where hosp_code=#{hospCode} and is_match='1' and is_valid ='1' and hosp_item_id=#{xmid} and insure_reg_code=#{insureRegCode}
and item_code=#{itemCode}

select id, insure_reg_code, item_code, hosp_item_id, hosp_item_name, hosp_item_code, hosp_item_type, insure_item_name, insure_item_code, insure_item_type, audit_code, is_match, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time from insure_item_match where hosp_code = #{hospCode} and insure_reg_code = #{insureRegCode} and hosp_item_id = #{hospItemId} and hosp_item_code = #{hospItemCode} and is_match = '1'
select * from insure_item_match where hosp_item_code = #{hospCode} and insure_reg_code = #{insureRegCode} and insure_item_code is not null
select * from insure_item_match where hosp_code =#{hospCode} and insure_reg_code =#{insureRegCode} and hosp_item_id =#{hospItemId}

select id, hosp_code, insure_reg_code, item_code, molss_item_id, pqcc_item_id, hosp_item_id, hosp_item_name, hosp_item_code, hosp_item_type, hosp_item_spec, hosp_item_unit_code, hosp_item_prep_code, hosp_item_price, insure_item_name, insure_item_code, insure_item_type, insure_item_spec, insure_item_unit_code, insure_item_prep_code, insure_item_price, deductible, standard_code, check_price, manufacturer, audit_code, is_match, is_trans, is_valid, take_date, lose_date, pym, wbm, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time from insure_item_match where hosp_code =#{hospCode} and id = #{id}

select a.id, a.hosp_code, a.bfc_code, a.type_code, a.big_type_code, a.code, a.usual_name, a.good_name, a.spec,a.prep_code, a.dosage,a.dosage_unit_code, a.out_unit_code, a.in_unit_code, a.rate_code, a.price, a.unit_code, a.last_buy_price, a.last_split_buy_price,a.avg_buy_price,a.avg_sell_price, a.split_ratio, a.split_unit_code, a.split_price, a.is_out, a.is_in, a.is_lvp, a.usage_code,a.insure_code,a.nation_code, a.drug_remark, a.drug_img_path, a.max_dosage, a.min_dosage, a.gender_code, a.min_age, a.max_age, a.ddd, a.durg_code,a.ph_code, a.antibacterial_code, a.is_skin, a.is_basic, a.basic_code, a.proton_pump, a.ndan, a.prod_code, a.usual_pym,a.usual_wbm, a.good_pym, a.good_wbm, a.is_valid, a.crte_id, a.crte_name, a.crte_time from base_drug a where a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and a.is_valid = #{isValid}

select a.id, a.hosp_code, a.nation_code, a.type_code, a.bfc_code, a.code, a.name, a.abbr, a.spec, a.price, a.one_price,a.two_price,a.three_price, a.unit_code, a.intension, a.prompt, a.except, a.remark, a.is_out, a.is_in, a.is_cg, a.is_ms, a.is_supp_curtain,a.other_name,a.out_dept_code, a.in_dept_code, a.name_pym, a.name_wbm, a.abbr_pym, a.abbr_wbm, a.is_valid, a.crte_id,a.crte_name, a.crte_time from base_item a where a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and a.is_valid = #{isValid}

select bm.id, bm.hosp_code, bm.type_code, bm.bfc_code, bm.code,bm.nation_code, bm.name, bm.spec, bm.price, bm.unit_code, bm.split_ratio, bm.split_unit_code, bm.split_price,bm.is_supp_curtain, bm.use_code, bm.remark, bm.prod_code, bm.reg_cert_no,bm.pym, bm.wbm, bm.is_valid, bm.crte_id, bm.crte_name, bm.crte_time,bm.other_name,bm.last_buy_price,bm.last_split_buy_price, bm.avg_buy_price,bm.avg_sell_price,bm.model from base_material bm where bm.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and bm.is_valid = #{isValid}

select bm.id, bm.hosp_code, bm.type_code, bm.bfc_code, bm.code,bm.nation_code, bm.name, bm.spec, bm.price, bm.unit_code, bm.split_ratio, bm.split_unit_code, bm.split_price,bm.is_supp_curtain, bm.use_code, bm.remark, bm.prod_code, bm.reg_cert_no,bm.pym, bm.wbm, bm.is_valid, bm.crte_id, bm.crte_name, bm.crte_time,bm.other_name,bm.last_buy_price,bm.last_split_buy_price, bm.avg_buy_price,bm.avg_sell_price,bm.model from base_material bm where bm.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and bm.is_valid = #{isValid} and ifnull(bm.type_code,'a') != '3'
select insure_reg_code from insure_item_match where insure_reg_code =#{insureItemCode} and hosp_item_code =#{hospItemCode} and is_valid = 1
